tours.name: Liberty
tours.description: Down the Hudson River to New York Harbor. We get as close as federal law allows to the Statue of Liberty, and you get a spectacular view of the NYC skyline

tours.name: Bridges
tours.description: Liberty tour plus a pass under the Brooklyn and Manhattan bridges, and great views up the East River

tours.name: Manhatan
tours.description: Get a glimpse of hidden New York as we make our way from the Hudson River, to the Harlem River, down the East River and around the Battery

tours.name: Design your own
tours.description: Build your own experience. There's little we will say no to. Let us know what you have in mind!
